EmailTemplate.name: System_Internal_DS Presents_Kaiser_9AM.Reject
EmailTemplate.subject: Rejection Notice: Your registration has been denied.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're Sorry.
DS Presents: Kaiser Hackathon Deep-Dive
Your registration request has been denied. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, DS Presents webinar series is exclusive to Pivotal employees only. If you feel you have received this email in error, please contact us <mailto:ajimenez@gopivotal.com>.
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team
